! Arista EOS MLAG Configuration
!
hostname arista-mlag-leaf-01
!
spanning-tree mode mstp
!
vlan 4094
   name MLAG_PEER
   trunk group MLAG_PEER
!
interface Vlan4094
   description MLAG Peer Link SVI
   no autostate
   ip address 10.255.255.1/30
!
interface Port-Channel1
   description MLAG Peer Link
   switchport mode trunk
   switchport trunk group MLAG_PEER
!
interface Ethernet47
   description MLAG Peer Link Member
   channel-group 1 mode active
!
interface Ethernet48
   description MLAG Peer Link Member
   channel-group 1 mode active
!
interface Port-Channel10
   description Server Connection via MLAG
   switchport mode trunk
   mlag 10
!
interface Ethernet1
   description Server-01 Port 1
   channel-group 10 mode active
!
mlag configuration
   domain-id MLAG_DOMAIN
   local-interface Vlan4094
   peer-address 10.255.255.2
   peer-link Port-Channel1
   reload-delay mlag 300
   reload-delay non-mlag 330
!
end
